entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:50 p.m. NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
